targets.expr: sum by(workspace, event_type) (rate(ingestion_read_rows_total{job="tinybird_org_metrics", workspace=~"$workspace", event_type=~"$event", pipe=~"$pipe"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(workspace, event_type) (rate(ingestion_read_bytes_total{job="tinybird_org_metrics", workspace=~"$workspace", event_type=~"$event", pipe=~"$pipe"}[$__rate_interval]))
